meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to stretch.
meanings.sent1: Her yoga instructor was impressed by her stretchabilities during class.
meanings.sent2: The fabric's stretchabilities made it perfect for athletic wear.
meanings.sent3: The rubber band showed off its stretchabilities by bouncing around the room.
meanings.sent4: His mind had the stretchabilities of a rubber band, always flexible and adaptable.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's incredible stretchabilities left the audience in awe.

meanings.sent1: The material's stretchabilities allowed it to be pulled in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The toy's stretchabilities made it fun for kids to play with.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's stretchabilities were put to the test during the party.
meanings.sent4: The city's infrastructure needed to have the stretchabilities to accommodate its growing population.
meanings.sent5: The rubber band's stretchabilities were put to good use when securing the papers together.
